channel.title: Network-inference on The Vera-Licona Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Network-inference on The Vera-Licona Lab

item.title: Development of Novel Network Inference Methods
item.description: Much of our research work is related to the development and application of algorithms related to the different undertakings for the reverse-engineering of dynamical systems, with an emphasis on discrete dynamical systems. These undertakings include: (1) Data discretization, (2) Static Network and Dynamical Modelâ€™s Inference, (3) Validation and Benchmarking of Reverse-engineering Algorithms, (4) Model Analysis and Simulation.
